plays.text: Penalty to Philippe Boucher 2 minutes for Tripping Pavol Demitra

Penalty to Jamal Mayers 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Adam Deadmarsh 2 minutes for High Sticking Cory Stillman
Penalty to Doug Weight 2 minutes for Slashing Bryan Smolinski
